mapper.insert: insert into interface(pid, project_id, path, restful_type, status, header_id, labels, service_id, des, request_header, params, body, response_body, user_id, directory_id, name) values (#{pid}, #{projectId}, #{path}, #{restfulType}, #{status}, #{headerId}, #{labels}, #{serviceId}, #{des}, #{requestHeader}, #{params}, #{body}, #{responseBody}, #{userId}, #{directoryId}, #{name})
